title: Crash when scrolling to last line of the flow
body:
##### Steps to reproduce the problem:

1. Open mitmproxy
2. Create some traffic
3. Try to scroll down to the last line of the "Flows" by using the "end" key on the keyboard

##### Any other comments? What have you tried so far?



##### System information

<!-- Paste the output of "mitmproxy --version" here. -->
```
./mitmproxy --version
Mitmproxy: 3.0.3 binary
Python:    3.5.2
OpenSSL:   OpenSSL 1.1.0g  2 Nov 2017
Platform:  Linux-4.14.14-300.fc27.x86_64-x86_64-with-fedora-27-Twenty_Seven
```
<!-- Please use the mitmproxy forums (https://discourse.mitmproxy.org/) for support/how-to questions. Thanks! :) -->

